summary.title: Online Bank Threat Model
summary.description: A financial institution that is developing a new online banking application. Our focus will revolve around modelling threats and vulnerabilities for this online banking application

threats.title: User Impersonation
threats.description: Threat actors impersonate legitimate users to gain unauthorized access
threats.mitigation:
Use strong, unique passwords that mix characters
Enable two-factor authentication
Use biometric identification
Verify the legitimacy of devices through additional mea

threats.title: Data Manipulation
threats.description: attackers modify or manipulated stored data
threats.mitigation:
use encryption
use strong access control method

threats.title: HTTP Request Manipulation
threats.description: Attackers attempt to change, manipulate, or inject malicious code, potentially causing harm or exploiting vulnerabilities.
threats.mitigation:
Block requests that use non-standard HTTP methods
Learn which methods are allowed for each URL
Detect non-standard HTTP methods and block requests using such methods
Disable HTTP OPTIONS method on your web server

threats.title: Data Exposed
threats.description: Attackers may steal, eavesdrop, or leak sensitive information, potentially leading to privacy breaches or data exposure
threats.mitigation:
Use strong passwords.
Use multi-factor authentication (MFA)
Keep software up to date.
Educate and train employees.
Create a response plan.
